next_steps.note: "Research and select 3 network scanning tools (e.g., Nmap, Masscan, RustScan) based on speed, features, and ease of use.",
"Define the scope of network scanning: Identify target IP ranges or domains, and specify any exclusions (e.g., critical systems).",
"Develop a basic Nmap script to perform a simple ping scan and port scan of a test network (e.g., a home network or lab environment).",
"Document initial findings and results from the test scan, including the number of live hosts and open ports discovered.",
"Investigate methods for identifying operating systems and services running on discovered hosts using the chosen scanning tools."
